name: January Birthday Rose - Real Rose Trimmed in 24K Gold
description: Here is a real, eleven-inch Birth Color Rose for the month of January, preserved and trimmed in 24K gold. Preservation of our roses takes over 40 handworked steps to maintain their natural beauty. We begin with special hand-selection of premium cut roses. Once we find our perfect rose, we carefully preserve it using true birth-month colors. Next, we hand trim our rose millimeter-by-millimeter to give it a sleek edging, and finally electro-plate it using 24K gold to perfect our masterpiece. The entire process takes over 3 months, but we feel the end result is worth every minute. Your rose will be sent using FREE ground shipping via UPS, which normally takes 2-5 days from when the order is processed. The rose is carefully packaged and delivered in a beautiful keepsake gift box. Note: Please e-mail us if you prefer expedited shipping, since this will increase the total cost. Feel free to contact us with any questions. -Love Is a Rose
